feed.title: Web Payments with PaySwarm: Identity (part 1 of 3)

entry.title: Web Payments with PaySwarm: Identity (part 1 of 3)
entry.summary: The attached link is a recommended read for anyone interested in the payment ecosystem on the web. The article discusses Payswarm identity and its potential integration with Bitcoin. The work spans over 5 years and is divided into three parts. It is published on Mozilla Hacks, a platform for developers to share their knowledge and insights. Manu has been copied in case anyone has any questions.
